metadata.name: Brian Garcia

persona.name: Elena Petrova
persona.goal: Get help with intermittent internet dropping and be routed to support resources
persona.context: Lunch rush is impacted; staff can’t process orders reliably; needs troubleshooting steps or correct support path
persona.tone: Frustrated, short messages, wants resolution quickly

intent.name: General Greeting / Start Conversation
intent.description: A customer opens with a greeting or minimal context, requiring a clarifying question to route.
intent.goal: Determine whether they are a new sales lead or an existing customer needing support.

emotion.name: Professional
emotion.description: Brief, businesslike messages; focuses on requirements, timelines, and next steps; avoids small talk.

metadata.outcome: Received correct support path (24/7 phone + support site) and will contact them directly.

turns.content: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to Comcast Business. What can I help you with today?

messages: Hi there! Thanks for reaching out to Comcast Business. What can I help you with today?

turns.content: My internet keeps dropping during our lunch rush and it’s killing order processing. I need this fixed or to get to the right support team quickly.

I’m sorry you’re losing internet during lunch rush—it’s definitely not the experience we want you having. For fast help, go to https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call our 24/7 support line.

messages: I’m sorry you’re losing internet during lunch rush—it’s definitely not the experience we want you having. For fast help, go to https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call our 24/7 support line.

turns.content: Got it, thanks. I’ll call support so we can get this stabilized before tomorrow’s lunch rush.
